channel.title: How can i put my drops on?
channel.description:
opkay ive looked so many places but i cant find out how i can put drops on
when im on the server and tryes to drop anything it says drops is been disabled and that i need to use empty instead. please help me.

item.title: How can i put my drops on?
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

fu**… sorry i didn’t noticed ur command… u have disabled drops from playerrights 0+

you see mine over here… do the same with yours… just delete playerrights 0 part so it should look like this to me

if(droppedItem == 6122){

setAnimation(1352);

sM("You sat down on a Chair...");

return;

}



if(action == 1)

return;

if(droppedItem == 1038 || droppedItem == 1039 || droppedItem == 1040 || droppedItem == 1041 || droppedItem == 1042 || droppedItem == 1043 || droppedItem == 1044 || droppedItem == 1045 || droppedItem == 1046 || droppedItem == 1047 || droppedItem == 1048

   || droppedItem == 4151 || droppedItem == 4152 || droppedItem == 35 || droppedItem == 1053 || droppedItem == 1054 || droppedItem == 1055 || droppedItem == 1056 || droppedItem == 1057 || droppedItem == 1058 || droppedItem == 1050 || droppedItem == 1051

   || droppedItem == 995){

sM("Dropping has been disabled for this Item.");

return;

}

sorry for my mistake since i didn’t noticed ur command

if im gonna explain better… here do this to ur drop thing

if(playerName == null)
return;
if(droppedItem == 4708){
replaceitem2(4708, 4860);
}
if(droppedItem == 4710){
replaceitem2(4710, 4866);
}
if(droppedItem == 4712){
replaceitem2(4712, 4872);
}
if(droppedItem == 4714){
replaceitem2(4714, 4878);
}
if(droppedItem == 4716){
replaceitem2(4716, 4884);
}
if(droppedItem == 4718){
replaceitem2(4718, 4890);
}
if(droppedItem == 4720){
replaceitem2(4720, 4896);
}
if(droppedItem == 4722){
replaceitem2(4722, 4902);
}
if(droppedItem == 4724){
replaceitem2(4724, 4908);
}
if(droppedItem == 4726){
replaceitem2(4726, 4914);
}
if(droppedItem == 4728){
replaceitem2(4728, 4920);
}
if(droppedItem == 4730){
replaceitem2(4730, 4926);
}
if(droppedItem == 4732){
replaceitem2(4732, 4932);
}
if(droppedItem == 4734){
replaceitem2(4734, 4938);
}
if(droppedItem == 4736){
replaceitem2(4736, 4944);
}
if(droppedItem == 4738){
replaceitem2(4738, 4950);
}
if(droppedItem == 4745){
replaceitem2(4745, 4956);
}
if(droppedItem == 4747){
replaceitem2(4747, 4962);
}
if(droppedItem == 4749){
replaceitem2(4749, 4968);
}
if(droppedItem == 4751){
replaceitem2(4751, 4974);
}
if(droppedItem == 4753){
replaceitem2(4753, 4980);
}
if(droppedItem == 4755){
replaceitem2(4755, 4986);
}
if(droppedItem == 4757){
replaceitem2(4757, 4992);
}
if(droppedItem == 4759){
replaceitem2(4759, 4998);
}
if(droppedItem == 4045 && !isInJail()){
deleteItem(4045, 1);
dealDamage(15);
hitDiff = 15;   
plrText = "Ouch!";
plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
updateRequired = true;
hitUpdateRequired = true;
setAnimation(827);
return;
}

delete plaerrights 0 thingy… and remember to always have a backupfile in case something goes wrong

item.title: How can i put my drops on?
item.dc:creator: @arve arve
item.description:
@arve wrote:

if (playerRights >= 0) {
sM(“Dropping has been disabled, use ::empty to delete your inventoy instead.”);
return ;
}
if(playerName == null)
return;
if(droppedItem == 4708){
replaceitem2(4708, 4860);
}
if(droppedItem == 4710){
replaceitem2(4710, 4866);
}
if(droppedItem == 4712){
replaceitem2(4712, 4872);

item.title: How can i put my drops on?
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

you go to client.java and search for “4151” or the whip id u got…
then after a bit u should find something like this

if (itemid = ****) || if (itemid = ****) ||… and soon

u should see at the bottom “dropping has been disabled for this item. use empty instead”

delete all of ur item id’s and then add one null or some staff armour that u can’t drop
Save
Compile
and it should work
